channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ken Griffin chips in to fund record-breaking $12 million contract for new US men’s soccer coach
item.description: The two year-deal is worth $6 million a year, making Pochettino the highest-paid coach in US soccer history.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Kroger, Petco, Moderna, Roku and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: How mortgage borrowers can capitalize before the Fed's anticipated rate cut
Amex Delta credit cards raise welcome bonus on all cards, earn up to 110,000 SkyMiles
item.description: Big changes coming to the Delta Amex suite of credit cards. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Deutsche Bank on what stocks to buy if Kamala Harris wins
item.description: The firm offered themes and stocks to watch if Democrats win in November.

item.title: What really drove Wednesday's stock-market rebound?
Verizon to lay off almost 5,000 employees in nearly $2 billion cost-cutting move
item.description: Over half of the employees concerned will exit in September and the rest by the end of March, according to the statement.

item.title: Why credit card fraud alerts are rising, and how worried you should be about them
item.description: Credit card fraud alerts are rising, but for every false alarm there is a real crime, often now linked to AI.

item.title: Verizon puts price tag on buyouts and says nearly 5,000 employees are leaving
Nasdaq CEO: U.S. economic growth would be 0.5% higher if it weren’t for fraud
item.description: Nasdaq's research shows how financial crime is an invasive drag on the U.S. economy.

item.title: Nvidia, OpenAI, Anthropic and Google execs meet with White House to talk AI energy and data centers
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei and Google President Ruth Porat met Thursday at the White House to discuss ...

item.title: Why McDonald’s will keep offering its $5 value meal into December
SEC signals Ethereum is not a security in settlement with eToro
item.description: The Gensler-led agency is allowing eToro to continue trading services for Ether, along with Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash.

item.title: Airbus Ventures launches $155 million fund focused on deep tech, including space
item.description: Airbus Ventures, one of the most prolific investors in space startups, raised an $155 million fund.

item.title: Moderna’s stock slides as it slashes research spending, trims pipeline
